To conclude that Lisa bought the red shirt (P), we would need to know that the only way Mark could have bought the blue shirt (Q) is if Lisa bought the red shirt (P). But the premises don't provide that information. It's possible that Mark bought the blue shirt for some other reason, unrelated to Lisa's actions.
